purpose: To provide an open-source platform for monitoring, evaluating, and experimenting with large language models (LLMs)
principle: Leverages observability techniques to track and analyze the performance and usage of LLMs, integrating with various LLM APIs for comprehensive monitoring
reusability: Offers easy integration with a single line of code, supports multiple LLMs and environments, and provides an API for custom monitoring setups
limitations: Primarily focused on LLMs, may not cover other AI model types; requires setup for specific use cases
